entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow in the morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
